Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netgrif.application.engine.auth.web.UserController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/user")
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="nae.user.web.enabled",
                       havingValue="true",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
